name: 2022 11th International Conference on Intelligent Information Processing
content: Paper Publication: The selected papers will be recommended to the "Special issue on Journal of Communications" and "Special issue on Journal of Image and Graphics". Journal of Communications ISSN: 1796-2021 (Online); 2374-4367 (Print) DOI: 10.12720/jcm Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus; DBLP; CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar; CNKI, etc. Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG) ISSN: 2301-3699 DOI: 10.18178/joig Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus (Since 2021), Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
